xxl.core.collections.queues.io
Class RandomAccessFileQueue.OutputStreamFactory

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.functions.AbstractFunction<java.lang.Object,java.io.OutputStream>
      xxl.core.collections.queues.io.RandomAccessFileQueue.OutputStreamFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Function<java.lang.Object,java.io.OutputStream>
Enclosing class:
RandomAccessFileQueue<E>
public class RandomAccessFileQueue.OutputStreamFactory
extends AbstractFunction<java.lang.Object,java.io.OutputStream>

A function that opens an output stream for writing serialized elements to the queue and returns it.
The implementation of this function opens the random access file queue first. Thereafter the file pointer of the random access file is set to its end and an output stream is returned, that redirects every calls to one of its methods to the corresponding method of the random access file.

See Also:
